name: www.ExpertRating.com
overview: ExpertRating’s products and services are popular among private individuals and corporate entities alike. More than 2,700,000 individuals across the world have obtained ExpertRating certifications since the company’s inception in the year 2000. Among the numerous companies that have availed ExpertRating’s services are Convergys, Deltek, IKEA Systems, Fox News, and Fiserv, to name a few. Initiatives such as the Employee Development Program for UPS (United Parcel Services), and custom skills assessment tests designed for Ericsson, and online services marketplaces like Elance, oDesk, LimeExchange and RentAcoder, are some of the key highlights of ExpertRating’s services.
